unnormalised: Arre bhai, India vs. Pak match is on 27/08/2024 at 7:30 PM IST, right? Hope they prepone it if rain is predicted, yaar!
normalised: Oh brother, India versus Pak match is on twenty seventh August two thousand and twenty four at seven thirty P.M. I-S-T, right? Hope they prepone it if rain is predicted, buddy!
